thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 07 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Realtech AG FY Consolidated Sales Of EUR 19.6 Million (Previous Year EUR 22.9 Million)

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Realtech AG FY Consolidated Sales Of EUR 19.6 Million (Previous Year EUR 22.9 Million)
text:
Realtech Ag:
* FY CONSOLIDATED SALES OF EUR 19.6 MILLION (PREVIOUS YEAR: EUR 22.9 MILLION)
* FY GROUP OPERATING EBIT OF AROUND EUR - 1.1 MILLION (PREVIOUS YEAR: AROUND EUR - 2.4 MILLION)
* EXPECTS OPERATIONAL BREAK EVEN AT LEAST AT MONTH LEVEL DURING 2018
* SEES 2018 MONTHLY BREAK EVEN IN ORDER TO BE ABLE TO ACHIEVE POSITIVE RESULTS FROM 2019 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
